sentences.cn: 绕体科寄生线虫一新种—— ( 毛圆目:绕体科 )

sentences.en: Cram ran a fine race to take the gold medal.
sentences.cn: 克拉姆在赛跑中成绩突出夺得金牌.

sentences.en: Gideon: And then you have to cram really hard for the exam.
sentences.cn: 基甸: 到最后一分钟才啃书本,非拚命不可.

sentences.en: He had to cram them all together.
sentences.cn: 他只好把这些全挤在一堆.

sentences.en: How do they all cram into that doll's house?
sentences.cn: 那小小的房子怎么挤得下他们大家 呢 ?

sentences.en: I managed to cram down a few mouthfuls of food.
sentences.cn: 我好歹狼吞虎咽地吃了几口东西.

sentences.en: I tried with all my might to cram it down its throat.
sentences.cn: 我尽我所有的力量想把它塞进它的喉咙.

sentences.en: It's difficult to cram everything into a tight schedule.
sentences.cn: 日程紧，很难把所有事情都安排进去。

sentences.en: She’s been cramming hard all week.
sentences.cn: 她整个星期都在拼命准备应付考试。

sentences.en: The case is small; we can't cram any more papers in.
sentences.cn: 这个箱子小, 再也塞不进文件了.

sentences.en: The room's full; we can't cram any more people in.
sentences.cn: 屋里满满的, 再也挤不进去人了.

sentences.en: There was such a cram in the church.
This paper reveals the internal relations and properties of the Cayley - Monger determinant and Cram determinant.
sentences.cn: 本文揭示Cayley—Menger行列式与Cram行列式的内在联系及性质,借助这一桥梁作用.

sentences.en: Thousands of people crammed the mall Sunday.
sentences.cn: 星期天成千上万的人挤进了这家大型购物中心。

sentences.en: Why are you always trying to cram your own ideas down my throat?
sentences.cn: 你为什么老想把你自己的想法强加给我 呢 ?

sentences.en: You can't cram eight people into that car!
sentences.cn: 你不能把八个人全部塞进那辆汽车!

words.tran_cn: 为应考而死记硬背的人

phrases.tran_cn: 临时抱佛脚；填鸭式地学习；死记硬背
补习班；补习学校，强化学校

trans.tran_cn: 把…塞进，挤满，（为应考）临时死记硬背
trans.tran_en: if a lot of people cram into a place or vehicle, they go into it so it is then full
